abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping appears ready to delay naming of his successor until after party congress in 2017, raising concerns that he plans to extend his hold on power; delay will allow Xi additional time to vet successors and ensure that their ideologies match his own; some fear move will lead to political tensions, or possibility that Xi will break precedent by remaining in power for more than two terms.

keywords.value: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The apparent plan by the Chinese president has unsettled the party elite and created uncertainty over whether Mr. Xi will try to stay in power beyond the usual two terms.
snippet: The apparent plan by the Chinese president has unsettled the party elite and created uncertainty over whether Mr. Xi will try to stay in power beyond the usual two terms....

headline.main: Xi Jinping May Delay Picking China’s Next Leader, Stoking Speculation
headline.print_headline: Defying Script, Chinese Leader May Delay Call on a Successor
